summary: Implements a Home Assistant camera platform for ONVIF‑compatible IP cameras, using FFmpeg to retrieve snapshots and provide live MJPEG streams, while exposing PTZ (pan/tilt/zoom) controls and device identification through Home Assistant services.
business_intent: Allows Home Assistant users to seamlessly add, view, and control ONVIF cameras within their smart home setup, supporting image capture, real‑time video streaming, and automated PTZ operations for security and monitoring purposes.
